member.name: M:EventLog.FileLog.GetTodaysFileName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds a filename based on a prefix, the current date and a file extension
member.param: The prefix to put in front of the date

member.name: M:EventLog.FileLog.LogText(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Log text into a text file
member.param: true, if you want to add default time info in front of the text to be logged
